api_calls.name: check_existing_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const resources = responseData.Resources || []; const groupId = resources.length > 0 ? resources[0].id : null; const groupExists = groupId !== null; return { ...currentVariables, group_id: groupId, group_exists: groupExists }; }

api_calls.name: delete_existing_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables, response) { const statusCode = response && response.status ? response.status : 200; const success = statusCode === 204 || statusCode === 200; const deletedGroupId = currentVariables.group_id; const hasError = responseData && responseData.ERROR; return { ...currentVariables, delete_success: success && !hasError, delete_status_code: statusCode, delete_error: hasError ? responseData.ERROR.message : null, deleted_group_id: deletedGroupId }; }

api_calls.name: verify_group_deletion
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const resources = responseData.Resources || []; const groupStillExists = resources.length > 0; const deletedGroupId = currentVariables.deleted_group_id; const foundDeletedGroup = resources.find(group => group.id === deletedGroupId); const deletionVerified = !groupStillExists || !foundDeletedGroup; let pollAttempts = 0; const maxAttempts = 6; const pollInterval = 2000; // If group still exists, poll to check if it gets deleted while (!deletionVerified && pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { pollAttempts++; console.log('Polling for group deletion, attempt ' + pollAttempts + ' of ' + maxAttempts); await delay(pollInterval); try { const pollResponse = await axios.get(`${currentVariables.workspace_url}/api/2.0/account/scim/v2/Groups`, { params: { filter: 'displayName eq "TEMP_OQ_105"' }, headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${currentVariables.token}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }); const pollResources = pollResponse.data.Resources || []; const pollGroupStillExists = pollResources.length > 0; const pollFoundDeletedGroup = pollResources.find(group => group.id === deletedGroupId); if (!pollGroupStillExists || !pollFoundDeletedGroup) { console.log('Group deletion verified after polling'); return { ...currentVariables, deletion_verified: true, poll_attempts: pollAttempts }; } } catch (error) { console.log('Error during deletion polling:', error.message); } } console.log('Group deletion polling completed after ' + maxAttempts + ' attempts'); return { ...currentVariables, deletion_verified: deletionVerified, poll_attempts: pollAttempts, deletion_polling_completed: true }; }

api_calls.name: create_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData?.id ? true : false; const newGroupId = responseData?.id || null; return { ...currentVariables, create_success: success, new_group_id: newGroupId }; }

api_calls.name: wait_for_group_availability
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const resources = responseData.Resources || []; const foundGroup = resources.find(group => group.id === currentVariables.new_group_id); const groupVerified = foundGroup !== undefined; return { ...currentVariables, group_verified: groupVerified, verified_group_id: foundGroup ? foundGroup.id : null }; }
